item.description:
Let's explore the beautiful Roger Williams Park (Not the Zoo). There are various ponds and landscapes to explore! We won't be in a rush walking this event, it will be mainly exploring the scenery. So, this is a leisurely walk.

Meeting place: Let's meet at the Carousel Village. I'll be wearing a green sweater, so you can find me ;)

Since it looks like it will be a nice sunny day, you might want to bring a camera if you're into photography.

The park's 435 acres feature over 100 acres of ponds that weave their way through the rolling landscape. The landscape includes specimen trees, the famous Rose Garden, and significant outdoor public sculpture.

Major attractions include the nationally-recognized Roger Williams Park Zoo, the Museum of Natural History and Planetarium, the Botanical Center, the Casino, the Carousel Village, the Temple to Music, the Todd Morsilli tennis courts, and the Tim O'Neil baseball fields.

See where to meet below:
Map link - http://maps.google.co...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting by the carousel in Carousel Village, wearing a green sweater.
item.name: Explore Roger Williams Park: Leisurely Walking Event :)
